revised_title: Chladni's Figures and Vibrations: An Experiment with Lycopodium Powder and Sand
tldr: The author describes an experiment using Chladni's figures, combining lycopodium powder and sand on a vibrating brass plate. The experiment demonstrates the separation of the two powders at the nodal lines and centers of maximum vibration, revealing the cyclonic air currents and the beauty of the resulting patterns.
